title: GetRight Pro 6.3e(with serial)
description:
What Is GetRightÃ‚Â®?

GetRight is a Download Manager program to help you download files from the Internet. It features download resuming, accelerating, scheduling and more...just read on!


Download Big Files?
    Never have to restart at the beginning after downloading 100&#039;s of Megabytes again.

    It doesn&#039;t matter how fast your connection is, if you download big popular files like game demos, Linux installs, or videos, you can still have problems with disconnections or slow servers. GetRight&#039;s resuming and acceleration will make your downloads painless and easy--and as fast as possible.

    As this picture shows, even at a good speed, a download can still take hours.

    This picture shows how you can see the progress as GetRight downloads different parts of the file at the same time. The colored bars show how different parts of the file are downloading at once--a faster server would fill its block, then jump to help fill another part of the file.
    Read more about resuming downloads and saving broken connections.

Want to get many files from a website?
    If you want to collect images, music, or other files from a website, GetRight will be a lifesaver. It has several tools to easily scan a whole website to extract and download just the files you want!

    Even rescan the same website later and just download the new or changed files, saving you even more time.
    Read more about server synchronization.

Ever lose a download?
    If you&#039;ve ever downloaded a file, then been unable to find it on your computer, GetRight will save you lots of time. Run files when they finish with just a click! When a download finishes, GetRight will show a window like the one here. You can simply click as it says to open the file.

    And GetRight&#039;s history will help you find your files too. A list will show all your recently completed downloads. You can use the built-in filters to see downloads finished today, yesterday, the past week, etc. Or choose one of the file type filters if you know you&#039;re looking for a program, video, etc!

Have a Modem?
    If you do, you surely have already experienced the biggest problem...you are downloading a file, and your modem gets disconnected, or call waiting interrupts, or your computer crashes, or any number of other problems. Then you have to restart the download from the very beginning, losing all the time you had already spent.

    GetRight solves this problem by allowing you to resume a download. If you got part of the file before the problem, GetRight will restart the download in the middle so it only gets the rest of the file, without having to restart from the beginning. This makes downloading your files much easier and faster.

    You can resume as many times as needed to get the file. Doing that 1800 MB demo shown above would take days using a modem, but you could spread it out over a week--even doing all downloading at night while you sleep!
    Read more about resuming downloads and saving broken connections.

Have a fast connection (DSL/cable/etc)?
    Even Better! You may have fewer broken downloads, but all the other features will be even more useful for you. GetRight&#039;s acceleration features can make a big improvement in your download speeds--GetRight can split up a file and download several pieces at the same time, which can really help get the most speed out of your fast connection.

    And when you do have any disconnections (which always seem to wait until you&#039;re downloading that BIG file) GetRight will be there and ready to resume when you need it!

    That fast connection can let you download lots of files, so you&#039;re even more likely to lose something; GetRight will help you find it.
    Read more about accelerating downloads. 


Features for Everybody.
GetRight has many more features.

    * GetRight can download not only from web and ftp servers, but also BitTorrent? downloads.
    * It integrates with your web browser, so using GetRight is as easy as clicking. You don&#039;t have to do anything special for it to do your downloads. Works with Internet Explorer, Firefox, Opera, Mozilla, Netscape, AOL, and MSN.
    * Huge files are no problem--download DVD-sized files (many Gigabytes).
    * Build a big list of everything to download, and set the order for downloading to just what you want so the important files come first.
    * Set it to turn off the computer when it is done getting the files so you can just leave it alone to do the work.
    * GetRight&#039;s History will let you easily find files you&#039;ve downloaded.
    * You can schedule a time when GetRight should start downloading to get your files...so it can do all the work in the middle of the night while you sleep.
    * GetRight includes several ways to scan a website to quickly grab batches of files.
    * If you listen to Podcasts, GetRight can automatically download them for you, even adding the files into a playlist in iTunes or Windows Media Player.
    * If you need to get the same files every day (like web log files) GetRight&#039;s Daily Downloads let you schedule files to be downloaded every day.
    * Its options let you make GetRight work just how you want. Make categories to organize your downloads, or just put them all in one spot. Tweak how it operates for many features, or just download without changing a thing. The choices are all yours.
    * More information: Getting Started with GetRight or Tips to get the Fastest Downloads pages.
    * And much more.
